name: Gloomy Countenance, Kuroyukihime
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: We'll, in fact, not be Burst Linkers anymore. And, our memories will remain.

name: Bond of the 《Accelerated World》, Kuroyukihime
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When a card named "Nega Nebulas" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, choose one of your other characters and this card, and until end of turn, those cards get +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When the damage dealt by this card is canceled, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to that card's level." (Climax are regarded as level 0. This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: I once felt exactly the same. I lost everything, and I thought I'd never be able to stand up again.

name: Vacillating Memories, Kuroyukihime
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +500 power.

【AUTO】 When you use "Accelerate", choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck."
flavor_text: One thing is for sure. Even if I forget about the Accelerated World…… I know for a fact, Haruyuki, that I will never forget you.

name: Summer Festival, Kuroyukihime
ability: 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, search your deck for up to one yellow character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck."
flavor_text: I'm happy we got together today.

name: 《Silver Crow》
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: Dress Fluttering in the Wind, Kuroyukihime
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have.

【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavor_text: Well I’ll tell you this, Haruyuki. No matter what the future may have in store for us, I’ll never regret choosing you.

name: Rousing Battlecry, Kuroyukihime
ability: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack.
flavor_text: Take up your swords and raise your torches high!! For the time to fight… has come!!

name: 《Lotus of Black Death》 Black Lotus
ability: 【CONT】 If a card named "Summer Festival, Kuroyukihime" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to one card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +4500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: But, I can’t even hold someone’s hand……

name: Looking Flushed After a Bath, Kuroyukihime
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put a card from the bottom of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.

Niko: "When this chick takes off her clothes,
she's actually…..."Niko: "When this chick takes off her clothes,
she's actually…..."

ability: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power.

【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put a card from the bottom of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room."
